meta.job_title: Associate Director, Corporate Accounts and Strategic Alliances

duties_responsibilities.duty: Creation of strategic plans for driving assigned objectives.
Management of strong internal and external relationships.
Contributes towards the global Corporate Account Management strategy.
Support Marketing in developing strategies and positioning tools needed for success in Corporate Account targets.

Provide feedback to inside personnel, Sales Management, Marketing Department, Technical Support, R&D, Customer Service, Regulatory, and Quality on changes in the marketplace or competitive trends and additional information.

Responsible for documenting all sales-related activities, sales calls, pertinent account and contact activities, account profiles in the CRM, sales reporting program call plans expense reporting, and travel logistics.
Development of promotional ideas and activities within assigned Corporate Accounts to assure achievement of leading indicators and consistent marketing share gain in target product lines.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS Degree in Business Administration, Finance, Healthcare Sciences & Marketing. MBA preferred
